name: Philips Hue Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Philips Hue Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Philips Hue API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Philips Hue API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: light
available_options: Light (值: light)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: update
available_options: Delete (值: delete) - Delete a light
Get (值: get) - Retrieve a light
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many lights
Update (值: update) - Update a light
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

lightId.name: lightId
lightId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
lightId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Light Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

on.name: on
on.natural_language_description: 参数名: On | 作用: On/Off state of the light | 默认值: True | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: alert (值: None) - The alert effect, is a temporary change to the bulb’s state
bri (值: None) - The brightness value to set the light to. Brightness is a scale from 1 (the minimum the light is capable of) to 254 (the maximum).
bri_inc (值: None) - Increments or decrements the value of the brightness. This value is ignored if the Brightness attribute is provided.
ct (值: None) - The Mired color temperature of the light. 2012 connected lights are capable of 153 (6500K) to 500 (2000K).
ct_inc (值: None) - Increments or decrements the value of the ct. ct_inc is ignored if the ct attribute is provided.
xy (值: None) - The x and y coordinates of a color in CIE color space. The first entry is the x coordinate and the second entry is the y coordinate. Both x and y are between 0 and 1
xy_inc (值: None) - Increments or decrements the value of the xy. This value is ignored if the Coordinates attribute is provided. Any ongoing color transition is stopped. Max value [0.5, 0.5]
effect (值: None) - The dynamic effect of the light
hue (值: None) - The hue value to set light to.The hue value is a wrapping value between 0 and 65535. Both 0 and 65535 are red, 25500 is green and 46920 is blue.
hue_inc (值: None) - Increments or decrements the value of the hue. Hue Increments is ignored if the Hue attribute is provided.
sat (值: None) - Saturation of the light. 254 is the most saturated (colored) and 0 is the least saturated (white).
sat_inc (值: None) - Increments or decrements the value of the sat. This value is ignored if the Saturation attribute is provided.
transitiontime (值: None) - The duration in seconds of the transition from the light’s current state to the new state
